abstract: As the media industry eagerly awaits the judge’s ruling in Barry Diller and John C. Malone’s acrimonious court battle for control of IAC/InterActiveCorp, one industry observer has placed his bets on the outcome.
lead_paragraph: As the media industry eagerly awaits the judge’s ruling in Barry Diller and John C. Malone’s acrimonious court battle for control of IAC/InterActiveCorp, one industry observer has placed his bets on the outcome.

headline.main: Placing Bets on the Diller-Malone Showdown
